example: a(3)=4 because 3^3=27 and 2^4=16 is power of 2 immediately below 27.
mathematica: Table[Floor[Log[2, 3^n]], {n, 0, 69}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Apr 06 2006 *)Table[Floor[n*Log[2, 3]], {n, 0, 68}] (* _L. Edson Jeffery_, Dec 11 2014 *)
